channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: M. Asam Beauty Is Our Tradition
channel.desc: Enjoy younger looking skin with M.Asam, an effective skincare range that blends innovative technique and ingredients including grape oil, to target fine lines and wrinkles.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Golden Hour Glow with Liz Earle
channel.desc: Golden Hour Glow with Liz Earle.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: skinSense by Abi Cleeve
channel.desc: Bringing together the latest, ground-breaking technology with the highest grade concentration of unique active ingredients, discover long-lasting skincare with anti-ageing benefits from skinSense.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Look Good, Feel Good
channel.desc: Find the best in health and fitness products to give you a spring in your step and a healthier lifestyle. From top tips and great gadgets, we'll help you to revitalise your daily routine.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Molton Brown on 5 Easy Pay
channel.desc: Indulge in luxury with Molton Brown's iconic bath and body blends, now available in 5 interest-free instalments. Elevate your daily routine with exquisite scents today.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Ultrasun Professional Suncare
channel.desc: Ultrasun have the answer to your summer holidays with once-a-day suncare protection. Tune in to find out which product is best for you and your family all year round.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Menopause Your Way
channel.desc: Join Jackie Kabler as she chats to our panel of experts and founders about the menopause, helping you navigate midlife on your terms. From inspiring stories to game-changing products, tune in today.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Sale
channel.desc: Look and feel fabulous from top to toe with our premium selection of beauty products from big name brands - all at bargain prices.
